hr_interview: Tell me about yourself.
Why do you want to work for our company?
What are your strengths and weaknesses?
Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

Why did you leave your last job?

How do you prioritize your work?
What motivates you in your work?

How do you handle stress and pressure?
What are your salary expectations?
What makes you a good fit for this role?
What do you like to do outside of work?
Can you give an example of a time when you demonstrated leadership?
How do you stay organized in your work?
What was the most difficult decision you made in your last job?
How do you handle feedback and criticism?
Can you describe a time when you had to learn a new skill quickly?
Why should we hire you?
